title: Personal Portfolio Site
bylinefaje: What you're looking at right now!
description: Designed and implemented using the Vue.js framework, inspired by Material tiles and Single Page Application layouts. The site is structured to be fairly reuseable, with most content inserted programatically, via a single constants file that can be modified easily.

title: Hack Track
description:
Hack Track is an Android application for use with the Android: Netrunner card game. It keeps track of the various resources, tokens, and actions that take place in the game.
  • Variable click track using touch gestures to increment/decrement clicks
  • Flipped resource counts for opponent's convenience
  • Unique layouts for the Corporation and the Runner
